title: can i order rp cards from a different country? (i am using the na server though)
body: can i order rp cards from a different country? (i am using the na server though) please answer asap!

replies.body: Nope! RP cards are region specific.  You'll want to make sure you're purchasing them for your specific region or you'll run into an error.

If I remember correctly, the RP cards can be region specific due to different currencies, however if you do manage to get a card for a different region and are unable to apply it to your account, you can send a support ticket and get it all worked out for you.
